1.title: DIY Cushion Eraser
1.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I'll show you how to make a Cushion Eraser. :] It's an eraser that looks just like a cosmetics cushion. I mistook it for a cosmetics product. If you enjoyed this video, comment down below.

2.title: DIY Lipstick Pencil School Supplies
2.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today I'm going to show you a Lipstick Pencil~. It looks like a lipstick, but it's actually a pencil. Do you want to write something with lipstick? If you enjoyed this video, comment down below.

3.title: DIY Liquid Handbag
3.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I'm going to show you how to make a LIQUID HANDBAG. :] Materials: Transparent Sheets, Glue Gun, Iron, Travel Pouch, Acetone,Pen, and Food Coloring.

4.title: DIY Lip Tint Tattoo
4.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I'll be making a Lip Tint Tattoo. :] Will it be able to save my poor lips? Materials: Peel-Off Mask, Paper Cup, Food Coloring, Empty Bottles (*bought the peel-off mask at \"Olive Young\").

5.title: DIY Eyebrow Tint Tattoo
5.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I'll be showing you how to make an Eyebrow Tint Tattoo. :] Let's start to make it!. Materials: Peel-Off Mask, Paper Cup, Food Coloring, Empty Bottles (*bought the peel-off mask at \"Aritaum\").

6.title: DIY Diamond Liquid Notebook
6.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you how to make a Diamond Liquid Notebook. Materials: Notebook, Transparency Film, Oil, Scissors, Iron, Line Tape, Glitter, Adhesive (Bond), Pen, and Acrylic Paint.

7.title: DIY Liquid Eraser
7.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you how to make a Liquid Eraser. Materials: Bottle Cork, Eraser, Utility Knife, Acrylic Paint, Oil, Glitter, Adhesive (Bond), and Clay. Thank you so much for watching my videos, everyone.

8.title: DIY Trick Art
8.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you how to make Trick Art. Maybe you can do this as a Halloween costume as well. Enjoy~. Materials: A4 Paper, Pen, Name Pen, Face Paint, Scissors, and Brush.

9.title: DIY Slime Soap: Let's Wash Our Hands!
9.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you how to make Slime Soap. Ingredients: Empty Bowl, Corn Starch, Body Wash, and Food Coloring. (Can replace body wash with shampoo; Can use corn starch with potato starch. It can't be made with baking soda, I'll edit that.) The food coloring were added to make them look more pretty; it doesn't necessarily need to be put in. But if you're really going to use it like soap, then you need to put food coloring in it.

10.title: DIY Edible Eye Shadow! Let's Try Eye Shadow!
10.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I'll show you how to make Edible Eye Shadow. Materials: Empty Case, Cornstarch, Food Coloring, Water, and Paper Cup. If you enjoyed this video, comment down below.

11.title: DIY Liquid Necklace
11.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you how to make a Liquid Necklace. Materials Used: UV Resin, UV Lamp, Water, Paint, Toothpick, Glitter, Pendant, and Necklace Chains. If you enjoyed this video, comment down below.

12.title: DIY Foam Stress Ball
12.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you how to make a Foam Stress Ball. :] Materials Used: Orbeez, Plastic Bottle, Transparent Balloon, and Liquid Glue. If you enjoyed this video, comment down below.

13.title: DIY Lipstick Soap
13.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you a DIY Lipstick Soap. Materials: Lipstick, Toothpick, Cotton Swab, Tissue, and Soap Clay (Red). If you enjoyed this video, comment down below. I want to know your opinion. Thank you so much for watching my videos, everyone. \nI'll make a lot more interesting videos.

14.title: DIY Lip Balm Ring
14.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today ,I show you how to make a Lip Balm Ring. Materials: Ring, Lens Case, Scissors, White Paints or Nail Polish, Bead\n Paper Cup, Vaseline, Hair Dryer, Tint, UV Lamp, and UV Resin.

15.title: DIY Pepero Gummy Jelly
15.plot: Hi, guys. Welcome back to the RiaRua channel. Today, I show you how to make Pepero Gummy Jelly. Materials: Pot, Agar Powder, Cup, Pepero, Tape, Straw, and Sugar Powder. If you enjoyed this video, comment down below.

imdb.title: RiaRua
plot: Hello, welcome to the _RiaRua_ (qv) channel. I make DIY , miniature and animation videos. Thank you so much for watching my videos, everyone.
